content.text:
# Draft:ISA National Awards (Spain)

}}
The International Society of Automation (ISA)'s Spain Section annually grants awards during its Annual Conference to recognize achievements in automation, control, artificial intelligence, education, leadership, and institutional support in industrial automation in Spain.
